alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Yakutat; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 10:41PM AKST until January 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD SNOW FOR THE PANHANDLE... .Snow has begun to fall across the panhandle from Yakutat through the inner channels south to Ketchikan and Metlakatla. Expect snowfall to increase overnight as the front moves through the area. While overall moisture remains low, there is a possibly of higher amounts around the Icy Strait corridor. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Yakutat, Juneau, Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Pelican, Ketchikan and Metlakatla. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates are expected to be late Sunday night into early Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
